trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Avon
There were no other sightings in Avon on or around November 16th 2010
Summary: three different lights moving diff. speeds no flashing lights
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving to Avon to go to walmart and on us 36 i looked up over the lights of Avon and there were three bright white lights no flashing red or blue or green just solid white moving to the right and i asked my wife if she seen them and she said yes two of them dissapeared behind the trees then the last one got brighter then vanished and thats the last i seen of them my wife thought it was three planes but i do not agree they were moving too slow as low as they were and too close together this experience was by far one of the creepiest ive seen
